Unsure whether you need to hold your fingers while you zoom. Attempting to zoom in while taking a picture. States device is “getting confused now”.

On the middle home page and kept trying to clock back but it turns glasses off. And when you turn glasses back on it doesn’t indicate what screen you’re on. Nothing telling you you could swipe right or left to get to the other pages of Home Screen to get back to what’s app.

When this is happening, he is in what’s app message trying to go back to Home Screen. But always ends up back in what’s app chat after turning device on and off. Thinks it’s partly due to neural band not picking up what he’s doing all the way.
